song_lyrics: Ek ja chho Swāmī tame sahuno sahāro,
Rākho tem raheshu jāṇī marjī tamārī,
Chāre kor bharyo bhavsāgar ā khāro... Ek ja chho° 1
Āshā sarve chhoḍī doḍī sharaṇmā āvyo,
Hetthī bolāvo Bāpā bāḷ chhu tamāro,
Chāre kor bharyo bhavsāgar ā khāro... Ek ja chho° 2
Chāre kor bharyo bhavsāgar ā khāro... Ek ja chho° 3
title: Ek ja chho Swāmī tame sahuno sahāro

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-3001: Vanmalidas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
